summary: When Phil said something to the likes of: “then maybe we’ll actually take care of ourselves” (when talking about the gaming...
body:
When Phil said something to the likes of: “then maybe we’ll actually take care of ourselves” (when talking about the gaming channel break) I felt that.
They deserve a break so much. They work so freaking hard, and i do think Phil got a sort of wake-up call when he fainted and had to go to the hospital… I mean, he said so himself, that he’s been burning the candle in both ends.
It’ll be good for them with a mental break from everything. 

Also, I’m so looking forward to cute insta stories from the North now that it’s out in the open that Dan will be there a few days :’)

It’ll be good for them with a mental break from everything. 

Also, I’m so looking forward to cute insta stories from the North now that it’s out in the open that Dan will be there a few days :’)

blog.name: yourpsychobubble

tags: i kinda wrote this for myself as well
summary: As I can see a lot of you are ‘having a meltdown’ here over several facts dnp mentioned in their liveshow, there is actually...
body:
As I can see a lot of you are ‘having a meltdown’ here over several facts dnp mentioned in their liveshow, there is actually nothing to be scared about:

• no more PINOF - yes that’s sad but literally they’re grown men I didn’t expect them to draw cat whiskers on their faces forever, besides we’re most likely would get yearly mukbanks which is much more intimate and exiting than scripted pinof scenarios

• gaming channel pause - that’s sad because it was consistent and regular but I saw it needed a change when they were uploading and touring, the games weren’t as exciting as they used to be, so we should give them time to figure out what’s the best option they can find to provide us entertaining content which they also will enjoy, they gave us what we wanted now it’s time we give them what they want and they’re not asking much - patience and trust and everything will be fine

• possibility of the duo split-up - that’s impossible just from the facts we were given, they’re not moving out, they’re ‘still friends’ lol and if they plan to do any stuff (mukbank for example) they’ll do it together

• Phil changing his set-up - finally we’ll see an amazingphil rebrand and I’m exited for what Phil’s creativity will bring us

• Dan being back to YouTube - after a year of break I’m so happy that Dan finally feels like he’s in the right state to make videos because he takes it seriously, videos represent people’s personality and I’m so excited to see his fresh opinions and content

Overall, we’re getting changes, but they’re not scary! It’s actually good that they care so much about the quality and I cannot wait to see what 2019 Dan and Phil have for us.

summary: i mean, you can clearly see these are positive changes and that they’re so much more sure of themselves because 1) dan mentioned...
body:
i mean, you can clearly see these are positive changes and that they’re so much more sure of themselves because 1) dan mentioned his bro for the first time in forever and said he’s better at cooking than him 2) they straight up told us dan is going up north because kath invited him. they told us. we didn’t find out because of a sneaky ig story from cornelia or a picture on instagram. they chose to tell us. talking is key.

i feel so good about this.

summary: Honestly I haven’t seen the live show yet but pinof and the gaming channel have been two major points of contention for me so...
body:
Honestly I haven’t seen the live show yet but pinof and the gaming channel have been two major points of contention for me so I’m honestly glad they’re gone.


(Or, one of them’s gone. The other is gone ~for now~)


It’s sounding like 2019 is either going to be one hell of a year, or they’re gonna drop off the face of the earth. Either way, I’m not that upset.

summary: Interesting theory that is probably crazy
body:
Interesting theory that is probably crazy

Maybe DAPG won’t be a gaming channel anymore. Or at least not strictly. Maybe they’ll want to rebrand it as still being their joint channel, but with the freedom of branching it out a bit to be able to put different types of content on it? I’m not exactly sure what that would mean, but just a thought I had.

summary: the thing about pinof is that i get if they dont want that apart of their branding anymore BUT when they did decide to ditch the...
question: the thing about pinof is that i get if they dont want that apart of their branding anymore BUT when they did decide to ditch the cat whisker branding they still did pinof and i get being done with it but at the same time they can still separate this video that they do once a year from dinof and ap
answer:
i don’t think this has anything to do with branding. this wasn’t just a career move, this was a personal move.

they are ready to do different things. we all knew pinof wasn’t going to last forever and this year felt good enough to them to finally close this chapter, to let go of something really cool and sweet that’s gonna be remembered forever only to start something new that feels closer to what they are now. they are free and unashamed and happy and i guess they just wanted to reach this point in their lives when they’re so sure of what they have together that they can move on to a different thing. it’s good. it hurts but it’s good. and i’m happy for them

trail.content:
i don’t think this has anything to do with branding. this wasn’t just a career move, this was a personal move.

they are ready to do different things. we all knew pinof wasn’t going to last forever and this year felt good enough to them to finally close this chapter, to let go of something really cool and sweet that’s gonna be remembered forever only to start something new that feels closer to what they are now. they are free and unashamed and happy and i guess they just wanted to reach this point in their lives when they’re so sure of what they have together that they can move on to a different thing. it’s good. it hurts but it’s good. and i’m happy for them

blog.name: phanbliss
blog.title: you don't have to say 'i love you' to say i love you
blog.description: Monika | she/her. I'm from Poland and I write fics. Ablissa on AO3.

summary: okay so that liveshow was A Lot but i just want to say don’t panic. this is good. this is great. this is them openly telling us...
body:
okay so that liveshow was A Lot but i just want to say

don’t panic.

this is good. this is great. this is them openly telling us dan is spending the lead up to christmas with phil on isle of man. this is them bickering about phil’s new coat. this is them being excited to give us more things that maybe suit them better right now. this is them wanting to change up their backgrounds (and possibly moving i don’t care what they say). this is them letting go of old traditions and making new ones.

this is a change, for them and for us, but it’s undoubtedly a good one. they’re not going anywhere. they’ll be here, with new things, and if 2018 is anything to go by, 2019 is going to be amazing.

summary: Could they have handled all of that a little bit better? Absolutely. Did they have to drop all of that on us all at once? Not...
body:
Could they have handled all of that a little bit better? Absolutely. Did they have to drop all of that on us all at once? Not really.

But they were very adamant that they aren’t going anywhere. We’ll still get main channel content. And the gaming channel probably isn’t going away forever, it’s a break which I think we all agree they deserve after the tour and everything.

I’m as upset as anyone. I hate that it feels like everything is ending and it’s scary, but like Phil said, change isn’t necessarily a bad thing, it can be a good thing. I’m sure they’ll continue to post on Phil’s channel and maybe Dan will actually get back to his channel too, and personally I think the gaming channel won’t take a super long hiatus, they just don’t want to promise any dates for it coming back in case it takes a little longer.

Let’s try to look on the bright side here: no more tiny bedroom video set for AmazingPhil! I believe the set change and the break for DAPG, and the final PINOF is all in the name of progress and moving forward. Good things are going to come, don’t stress too much!
